author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fixes to dav-mirror to compile against trunk of mod_dav_svn.
* mod_dav_svn.c
(SVNMasterURI_cmd): Implement directive under new naming strategy.
(proxy_merge_fixup): Update in change to dav_svn__get_special_uri()
(proxy_merge_fixup, location_in_filter, location_header_filter,
location_body_filter): Update to correct conf_t name.
(cmds): Correct prototype for SVNMasterURI directive.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add initial patch for the dav-mirror code.  It functionally works, but may
need more work as we improve it.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/mod_dav_svn.c:
Include http_core.h and apr_strmatch.h as we need functions from them.
Add SVNMasterURI directive that points at the 'master' repository.
(dav_svn_dir_conf): Add master_uri and root_dir fields.
(dav_svn_create_dir_config): Track what our top-level directory is.
(dav_svn_merge_dir_config): Inherit master_uri normally, but take the
parent's root_dir if it exists.
(dav_svn_master_uri): Add helper function to set dav_svn_dir_conf->master_uri
(dav_svn_get_master_uri): Add helper function to set
dav_svn_dir_conf->master_uri
(proxy_merge_fixup): Add fixup hook that will redirect things to the proxy
if we're configured correctly, otherwise we will redirect to the proxy.
(location_in_filter, location_header_filer, location_body_filter):
Various httpd filters used to rewrite the location in the body and headers
(register_hooks): Register our filters and install or proxy fixups.
[Originally committed as r4201, with some minor tweaks.]

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Create branch for dav mirror patches (branched from r21983)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Delete dav-mirror in preparation for recreation (easier than merging).

author: striker
msg: Add alias functionality to authorization configuration.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/authz.c
(authz_alias_is_user, authz_validate_alias):  New function.
(authz_group_contains_user): Resolve aliases within groups.
(authz_parse_line): Resolve aliases.
(authz_group_walk, authz_validate_rule): Verify existence of referenced
aliases.
(authz_validate_sect): Validate new 'aliases' section.
